description: Update current billing features for an Application Insights component.

datavolumecap.description: An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

resource_name.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

billing_features_properties.description: Properties that need to be specified to update billing features for an Application Insights component.

currentbillingfeatures.description: Current enabled pricing plan. When the component is in the Enterprise plan, this will list both 'Basic' and 'Application Insights Enterprise'.
